name: roblox.com 2014 style
description:
(Works the best at light mode)

This took me 1 day trying to find all of the assets, i also managed to somehow change the play button to play.

Recommended size is 75% or 80%. (The reason why is because it's sometimes buggy on 90% or above.)


(If you want me to make a style for a website, go ahead, you can tell me in the comments and maybe i'll do it.)

user.name: i cant think of an username

additional_info:

-Fixed the play button not appearing bug

Feb 23 2022
Alright so i didn't add too much stuff, but i'll probably do more in the future.

- Changed limited unique logo
- Fixed bugs

Thats all i guess, i will improve the style in the future.
